me pilibada awabodhayak warthamanaye simitha mattamakin ithiri wi thibena udarata nithiya hadarimedi laba gatha haka.udarata nithiya ( thesawalamai nithiya men ) lankawa thula upa nithiyak lesa piligane.enam udarata sinhala janayata yam yam wisheshitha karunu waladi pamanak adala wena upa nithi kramayak lesa eya kriyathmaka we.udarata nithiya yanu ingrisin udarata yatath karaganimata pera udarata palath wala pawathi paramparika nithiyayi.sinhala nithiyak lesa pirisidu arthayen salakiya hakke udarata nithiya pamanaki yanna el.je.em.kure wani shasthragnyayan dakwa thibena adahasaki.

petrogradaya (aragalaye prathipalaya- pariwarthaka) thindu karanu athi bawa sabawi - eheth kamkaru panthika pakshaye sathuran ema nagaraya thula salakiya yuthu balakayak eekarashi kara gena sitithi: anargha lesa sannaddha keruna wu da sanwidhanaya karanu labuwa wu da siya panthi thathwaya nisa satan kirimata aasaktha wu ha sudanam wu da junkarayan nyakadet niladharin% 5,000k ee athara wethi; ee mathu no wa hamuda mulasthanaya; hadisi kadawadina hamuda; kosakwaru; balakotuwe hamudawen sahena kotasak; eemadiwata kalathuwakku hamudawen itha shakthimath kotasak petrograng nagaraya wata awanak men yoda atha. 11

nila sancharayak sandaha japanaye upa agamathi taro aaso mahatha saha erata parlimenthuwe jyeshta upa mudal amathini yuko obuchi mahathmiya shri lankawata paminethi.shri lankawa saha japanaya athara pawathna rajyathanthrika sahayogithawa wardhanaya kirima saha ema sabandatha thawaduratath shakthimath kirime man soya balime aramunin mema japana niyojitha kandayama eeye (1) rathriye shri lankawata pamini athara janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage aaradhanayakata anuwa me sancharaya siduwana bawa shri lankawe japana thanapathi karyalaya pawasayi.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha pasugiya marthu masayedi japanaye kala nila sancharayedi kala aaradhanayakata anuwa japanaye upa agamathiwaraya saha jyeshta upa mudal amathiniya shri lankawe sancharaya karana athara owun samanga japana rajaye ihala pele niyojitha pirisakda shri lanka sancharayata ekwana bawada ema karyalaya sadahan karayi.mema rajyathanthrikayange nila sancharaya atharathura shri lankawa saha japanaya athara pawathina dirghakalina sambandhatha thawaduratath shakthimath karamin janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha samanga nila sakachcha pawathwimata niyamitha athara eeta amatharawa kolambaa waraye saha naw thatakanganaye sancharaya kirimatada niyamithawa atha.nila sancharayak sandaha shri lankawata pamini japanaye upa agamathiwaraya saha erata parlimenthuwe jyeshta upa mudal amathiwariya katunayaka bandaranayaka jathyanthara guwan thotupaledi piliganu labuwe aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahatha wisini.me athara sancharayak sandaha shri lankawata paminena japana parlimenthuwe jyeshta upa mudal amathini yuko obuchi mahathmiya aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshayedi amathi basil rajapaksha mahatha hamuwi sakachcha kirimatada niyamithaya..
